msContents.summary: Gloss on Qāḍī Mīr's commentary on Athīr al-Dīn al-Abharī's Ḥidāyat al-ḥikmah, a work on philosophy.

title: Ḥawāshī kāshifah ʻan ghawāshī ʻalá Sharḥ al-Hidāyah.

title.#text: حواشي كاشفة عن غواشي على شرح الهداية

persName.#text: Muṣliḥ al-Dīn al-Lārī, Muḥammad ibn Ṣalāḥ, -1571 or 1572
مصلح الدين اللاري، محمد بن صلاح،
Qāḍī Mīr, Ḥusayn ibn Muʻīn al-Dīn, -1504 or 1505
قاضي مير، حسين بن معين الدين،

msItem.title: Ḥawāshī kāshifah ʻan ghawāshī ʻalá Sharḥ al-Hidāyah.

supportDesc.extent: i, 72, ii leaves : 236 x 127 (158 x 84) mm, bound to 238 x 130 x 12 mm

layoutDesc.layout: Written in 19 long lines with two distinct, ruled margins along the outside edge for notes and wide margins on the upper, lower, and inside edge, also for notes.

scriptDesc.scriptNote: Written in nastaʻlīq in black ink; pointed.

binding.p: Bound in marbled cardboard sides with bright blue paper doublure.

origin.p: Copied: 1094 A.H. (1683) by al-Ḥājj Muḥammad Amīn ibn Ibrāhīm (f. 72v).

provenance: Formerly owned by George Arthur Plimpton (bookplate inside front cover).

term: Qāḍī Mīr, Ḥusayn ibn Muʻīn al-Dīn,---1504 or 1505--Sharḥ Hidāyat al-ḥikmah
Athīr al-Dīn al-Abharī, al-Mufaḍḍal ibn ʻUmar,---1265--Hidāyat al-ḥikmah
